params.balance0: The balance of token0 after the swap
params.balance1: The balance of token1 after the swap
params.ratio0: The ratio of token0 in the pool after the swap
params.ratio1: The ratio of token1 in the pool after the swap

params.amountIn: The amount of tokens to swap
params.pair: The address of the token pool
params.sqrtPriceLimitX96: The price limit for the swap
params.zeroForOne: True if swapping token0 for token1, false otherwise

SwapError(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Error containing information about a swap (for a simulation)
